title: LATA - Language Analysis & Translation Assistant
description: Advanced NLP system leveraging large language models for multilingual text analysis, translation, and sentiment analysis. Implements state-of-the-art transformer architectures for real-time language processing.

title: mAI-Mail - Intelligent Email Management
description: AI-powered email management system using machine learning for automatic categorization, priority scoring, and smart reply suggestions. Features advanced text classification and natural language generation.

title: KonnectNXT - Social Network Platform
description: Full-stack social networking platform with real-time messaging, content recommendation algorithms, and advanced user analytics. Built with modern web technologies and scalable architecture.

title: VayuBuddy - Environmental Chatbot
description: Intelligent chatbot for environmental awareness and air quality monitoring. Integrates real-time data APIs with conversational AI to provide personalized environmental insights and recommendations.

title: Neural Gaze Prediction System
description: Computer vision system for predicting human gaze patterns using convolutional neural networks and bidirectional GRU architectures. Achieved high accuracy in eye-tracking applications.

title: Academic Portfolio Website
description: Responsive, modern portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode toggle, modular components, and optimized performance for academic and professional presentation.
